title: Souls Undead 01 - Game Assets + Extra
description: Souls Undead 01 with equipment & armor! Designed to be versatile for the Modern, Futuristic or Medieval Horror/Action game!
longDescription:
A unique Souls Undead for your game, designed to be versatile for the Modern, Futuristic or Medieval Horror/Action game with equipment and armor!


Have you already purchased at least one Stigma Studios product on UE MarketPlace? Join on Discord and access to a Limited Promo - You can choose one Product for FREE
LOYALTY PROGRAM - The loyalty program is very simple for each product purchased you will get percentage points to convert into a percentage discount coupon! For more info check here or on discord!
This is a limited promotion, if you have ever purchased even a single Stigma Studios product in the UE Marketplace, that will allow you to have one character of your choice for FREE! Once you have entered the Discord, check the #welcome channel and follow the instructions! This promo is not cumulative, is valid only once.
Request for custom character? Take a look Here


Do you want to save 20% on your entire first collection of Souls Undead? Get Souls Undead Bundle 01 Here!


Following you can find a Detail Overview video, Demonstration Video and tutorial to retarget UE4 animation to Souls Undead Character


Souls Undead 01 - Detail Overview Video

Updates are planned for this assets in the future and may increase in price!


Join on Discord for:

Limited Promo: Special promotions for all users and loyal users.

Product Support: Receive support for the purchased product.

Update: Track the status of new upcoming production.

Suggestions: Vote the next pack or recommend what you would like see next or future update.


Thanks for the support!


Epic Games Animation is used for display/example only
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Full 3D Character: 3d model to get a unique design impact for your game.
  • Extra: equipment and armor!
  •  Versatile Design: Model designed to be used in different artistic contexts and be versatile.


Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

Socket: Equip_Blade under Bone: lowerarm_twist_01_l

Animated: Yes ( ONLY Epic Games Default Third Person Animation for Demonstration purpose retarget to Souls Undead 01)

Number of Main Characters: 1

Vertex counts of Main Character: 19.828

Tris counts of Main Character: 31.067


Texture Resolutions: 4096x4096

Number of Animations: 9 (ONLY Epic Games Default Third Person Animation for Demonstration purpose retarget to Souls Undead 01)
